title: Rock cakes
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) butter', '250g (9 oz) caster sugar', '1kg (2 lb) plain flour', '3 tablespoons baking powder', '50ml milk', '3 eggs', '500ml water', '1 teaspoon of finely grated orange or lemon rind', '300g (10 oz) sultanas (or mixed peel)', 'Demerara sugar for added crunch']
